name: breldmd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c0, c1, c3))
stmt.pretty: syl3anc(w0, c0 ∈ dom(c1), c0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4, c0[c1]c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c3, c4), wbr(c0, c1, c3)), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c3))

comment: Membership of first of a binary relation in a domain. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Apr-2023.)
